channel.title: Eek! hackers
channel.description:
So what happened was There was this guy called rabbaza or somthing vame on my server and he hacked it and made it laggy as shit, anyways now that hes stopped I keep getting [KERNEL] machine is to slow to run this server!
help with this would be highly appriciated

item.title: Eek! hackers
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

Like mine. >_> But I’ve been running my server off a VPS, I got up to around 45MB’s worth of character files before I started lagging any at all, then I just went in and deleted all the syi char files and char files that weren’t be used, and it cleaned it up. But, my VPS went down (stupid BurstNET) and I’m considering working on my new project, Project Corrupted. So far it’s coming along nice, I’ve got a working Taverly Dungeon, Slayer Tower, Caves and I’m working on a 100% Brimhaven Dungeon, among other stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Eek! hackers
item.dc:creator: @Mazeingmaze Mazeingmaze
item.description:
@Mazeingmaze wrote:

That shouldn’t be much of a problem unless you have a really crappy computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Eek! hackers
item.dc:creator: @java_is_my_bitch1 java is my bitch.
item.description:
@java_is_my_bitch1 wrote:

[quote=“Mazeingmaze, post:4, topic:248048”]Well, restart your computer and try your server again.
If that doesn’t work, you can take out the statement that creates you from running the server over 7 people.

In server.java, take out:

if(++waitFails > 100) { shutdownServer = true; misc.println("[KERNEL]: machine is too slow to run this server!"); }[/quote]I figured out what He did he multiplyed the moreinfo file by 8 we had 3k char files. lmao

Read full topic

item.title: Eek! hackers
item.dc:creator: @Mazeingmaze Mazeingmaze
item.description:
@Mazeingmaze wrote:

Well, restart your computer and try your server again.
If that doesn’t work, you can take out the statement that creates you from running the server over 7 people.

In server.java, take out:

if(++waitFails > 100) { shutdownServer = true; misc.println("[KERNEL]: machine is too slow to run this server!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Eek! hackers
item.dc:creator: @java_is_my_bitch1 java is my bitch.
item.description:
@java_is_my_bitch1 wrote:

[quote=“Mazeingmaze, post:2, topic:248048”]Try another source, if that still happens - get another source.[/quote]Um since the lag nobodys been coming on and the [kernal] comes when about 7 ppl are online. so I cant relli test anoda source

Read full topic
